mapper.update: update t_order_detail set orderprice=#{price} where orderid=#{orderId} and orderdetailid=#{orderDetailId}
mapper.select: select (a.orderprice*a.dishnum)-IFNULL(a.discountamount,0) as amount,a.dishnum as dishnum,a.dishid as dishidleft,a.sperequire as avoid,a.begintime as begintime,a.username,a.orderprice as orderprice,a.discountrate as discountrate,a.discountamount as discountamount ,b.dishtype,a.dishunit,a.payamount as payamount,a.predisamount as predisamount,case when a.pricetype=2 then concat('(礼)',IFNULL(f.dishname,b.title)) else IFNULL(f.dishname,b.title) end as title,b.image,b.dishid,c.itemid,c.itemdesc,a.dishstatus,a.primarykey,a.parentkey,a.ismaster,a.ispot,a.childdishtype,a.relatedishid from t_order_detail a inner join t_dish b on(a.dishid=b.dishid) left join t_basicdata c on(b.source=c.ID) left join (select max(dishname) as dishname,dishid from t_template_dishunit where menuid=(select tm.menuid from t_branch_info tbf,t_menu_branch mb,t_menu tm where tbf.branchid = mb.branchid and mb.menuid = tm.menuid and tm.status ='1' order by tm.effecttime desc limit 1) group by dishid) f on(a.dishid=f.dishid) where (not a.dishtype in(3,4)) and a.dishnum<>0 and a.status<>5 and orderid=#{orderId} order by a.begintime
